incidents.name: SMS and MMS Delivery Delays To and From a Subset of Twilio Phone Numbers in Australia

incident_updates.body:
We continue to observe latency in SMS and MMS delivery reports sent from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia to network subscribers, specially during the peak traffic between 14:00 and 20:00 PST. However, the actual SMS and MMS are being delivered on time.

For the SMS and MMS from network subscribers to a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia, we are observing delivery delays.

We have identified that the primary cause of this latency is an ongoing undersea cable fault. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to observe latency in SMS and MMS delivery reports sent from a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Australia to network subscribers, specially during the peak traffic between 14:00 and 20:00 PST. However, the actual SMS and MMS are being delivered on time.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Flex insights OpenSearch version upgrade - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in US1 region between 9:30 PM and 12:00 AM Pacific Time on 02/19/2026. During the maintenance window, customers may experience the below issue:
-Increased rejections for incoming requests as the cluster load increases during blue/green deployments.
-Increased API latency on sync insights APIs.
-Possible loss of Taskrouter data on Sync Insights platform, that could lead to stale data on Teams View UI and API/SDK requests.
-Sync Insights APIs timeouts for API and Twilsock (SDK) requests.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting Team is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, February 7th, 2026, at01:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Flex Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting an emergency maintenance from 07 February 2026 at 13:30 PST until 08 February 2026 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 February 2026 at 13:00 PST until 08 February 2026 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States and Canada Twilio SMS and MMS Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 February 2026 at 20:00 PST until 19 February 2026 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Singapore Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 February 2026 at 09:00 PST until 25 February 2026 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from Twilio Singapore phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct a planned maintenance from 27 February 2026 at 22:00 PST until 28 February 2026 at 05:30 PST on the Twilio Network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from the US connecting through Twilios US2/San Jose edge location.

incident_updates.body: Twilio will conduct a planned maintenance from 27 February 2026 at 22:00 PST until 28 February 2026 at 05:30 PST on the Twilio Network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent message delivery failures and delivery delays to and from the US connecting through Twilios US2/San Jose edge location.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Beeline

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 06 February 2026 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2 The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 02 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 25 February 2026 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

02 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 02 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
04 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 04 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
09 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 09 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
11 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 11 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
16 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 16 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
18 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 18 February 2026 at 16:00 PST
25 February 2026 at 12:00 PST until 25 February 2026 at 16:00 PST

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.
